headline: Pentair: Water Play Commanding A Premium Valuation
summary: Pentair has a strong segment margins and a focus on various sustainable water solutions. Read what makes PNR stock more appealing on dips.

headline: Is Pentair plc (PNR) Among the U.K. Dividend Champions for 2024?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the U.K. Dividend Champions List: 2024 Rankings by Yield. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Pentair plc (NYSE:PNR) stands against the other U.K. dividend champions.
